div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 31 Scyros, c. 1929 Burial: 5th cent. B.C. (T) Contents: 3+ AR Scyros: 2 didr.; 1 dr. ANS 1944.100.17818 ANS 1967.152.241 ANS 1944.100.17821 Disposition: New York Newell records the coins, purchased in 1929 from Seltman, as from the Scyros hd. but gives no further information
